scripts.student-book: mkdir -p output-student && npm run-script student-draft && npm run-script student-genkeys && npm run-script student-draft && pdflatex -output-directory=output-student src/llibre-3eso-student.tex
scripts.teacher-book: npm run-script teacher-pax && mkdir -p output-teacher && npm run-script teacher-genkeys && pdflatex -draftmode -output-directory=output-teacher src/llibre-3eso-teacher.tex && pdflatex -output-directory=output-teacher src/llibre-3eso-teacher.tex
scripts.answers-book: export TEXINPUTS=".:./src:" && mkdir -p output-answers && npm run-script student-draft && npm run-script answers-genkeys && pdflatex -draftmode -output-directory=output-answers src/llibre-3eso-answers.tex && pdflatex -output-directory=output-answers src/llibre-3eso-answers.tex && open -a Preview output-answers/llibre-3eso-answers.pdf
scripts.help: echo "npm run student-book :: Generates student's book"
